name: Marble Mania (duckSPLASH)
description:
Marble Mania 

is a 3rd person platformer made in Unity3D.

Challenge yourself to get the marble to the goal without running out of time but be careful, everything wants to shatter your plans and you'll have to take on strange enemies and dodge death at every turn. 

The aim of the game is simply to get a high score and there is only one rule:

Do not run out of time!

Presented is a three level demo which may or may not be expanded if there is any interest in this kind of game from the public at large.

Features:

Customise your marble by changing the centre piece and colour scheme.

Responsive health status - your marble will become more and more cracked as you take damage until it shatters.

Challenging enemies and obstacles including sharks, pirates and more.

Adjustable difficulty.

Secret areas containing high scoring artefacts.

My primary reason for making this game is to further my learning of Unity and to demonstrate my ability to use Unity, Blender & Substance.
